Scripts.OnClick: local parent = self:GetParent() if parent.collapsed then parent:Collapse( false ) else parent:Collapse( true ) end PlaySound(54131)

Scripts.OnLoad: self:RegisterForClicks("LeftButtonUp", "RightButtonDown"); DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "Target Marker Icon", nil, nil, nil, "A unique icon to represent this unit.|n|cFF707070<Left/Right Click to Toggle>" )
Scripts.OnClick: if DiceMaster4.IsLeader( true ) then if button == "LeftButton" then self.State = self.State + 1; if self.State > 9 then self.State = 1 end elseif button == "RightButton" then self.State = self.State - 1; if self.State == 0 then self.State = 9 end end self:SetNormalTexture("Interface/TARGETINGFRAME/UI-RaidTargetingIcon_" .. self.State ) if self.State == 9 then self:SetNormalTexture(nil) end PlaySound(823) DiceMaster4.UpdateUnitFrames() end
if DiceMaster4.IsLeader( true ) then DiceMaster4.AffixEditor_Open( self:GetParent() ) end

Scripts.OnLoad: self:SetChecked(false) DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "Hidden", nil, nil, nil, "Your group cannot see this unit." )
Scripts.OnClick: if DiceMaster4.IsLeader( true ) then if self:GetChecked() then self:GetParent():SetAlpha(1) DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "Visible", nil, nil, nil, "Your group can see this unit." ) else self:GetParent():SetAlpha(0.7) DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "Hidden", nil, nil, nil, "Your group cannot see this unit." ) end PlaySound(905) self:GetScript("OnEnter")(self) DiceMaster4.UpdateUnitFrames() end

Scripts.OnLoad: self:SetFont("Fonts\\FRIZQT__.TTF", 10, nil) self:SetAutoFocus( false ) self:SetTextColor( 1, 0.82, 0 ) self:SetMaxLetters( 23 )

DiceMaster4.UnitFrame_Init( self ) self:SetPortraitZoom(0.6) self.name:SetText("Unit Name") self.visible = true self:Reset() DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "Unit Frame", nil, nil, nil, "Represents a custom unit.|n|cFF707070<Left Click to Edit>|n<Shift+Left/Right Click to Add/Remove>|n<Ctrl+Left Click to Talk>" )
Scripts.OnSizeChanged: local qw, qh = self:GetWidth()*1.3, self:GetHeight()*2.3 --print( qw, qh ) self:SetDisplayInfo(self:GetDisplayInfo()) self:SetPortraitZoom(0) self:SetPortraitZoom(0.6)
Scripts.OnMouseDown: if DiceMaster4.IsLeader( true ) then if IsShiftKeyDown() then if button=="LeftButton" then DiceMaster4.CreateUnitFrame() elseif button=="RightButton" then DiceMaster4.DeleteUnitFrame( self ) end elseif IsControlKeyDown() then DiceMaster4.MarkUnitFrame( self ) elseif button=="LeftButton" then DiceMaster4.AffixEditor_Open( self ) end end
